title: Given the odds 1/10 how can I determine a winner from 200 entrants using php
body:
Given the odds 1/10, meaning 1 in every 10 entrants will win, how can I determine a winner from 200 entrants mathematically? I am trying to determine the correct math algorithm.

I was thinking something along the lines of this:

  1. Take the total amount of clients and divide by the odds. Example 200/10 = 20
  2. Create an array consisting of 10 elements with 20 members each.
  3. Randomly select one of the groups
  4. Randomly select someone from the selected group

This does not look correct. Can someone assist.
